metrics

Class RunningMedian

  • java.lang.Object
    • metrics.RunningMedian

  • public class RunningMedian
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the median. Taken and modified from my Running Median code which was written for the Coding Challenge for Insight Data Engineering.
    Version:
    October 2015
    Author:
    Elizabeth Fong
